markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Winding Flow](/Feats.aspx?ID=467) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 163 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per round

</column>

---

Any journey consists of more than simply reaching your destination. You use two of the following actions in any order: Stand, Step, and Stride. You can’t use the same action twice.
name: Winding Flow
